sourcesContent:
"use client" import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Calculator, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const algorithms = [ { title: "Kadane's Algorithm", description: "Find the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray", path: "/array-algorithms/kadanes-algorithm", timeComplexity: "O(n)", spaceComplexity: "O(1)", color: "from-blue-500 to-indigo-500" }, { title: "Prefix Sum", description: "Calculate cumulative sum of array elements", path: "/array-algorithms/prefix-sum", timeComplexity: "O(n)", spaceComplexity: "O(n)", color: "from-green-500 to-teal-500" }, { title: "Sliding Window", description: "Find maximum sum of subarray with fixed size", path: "/array-algorithms/sliding-window", timeComplexity: "O(n)", spaceComplexity: "O(1)", color: "from-orange-500 to-yellow-500" }, { title: "Hashing", description: "Find pairs that sum to target using hash map", path: "/array-algorithms/hashing", timeComplexity: "O(n)", spaceComplexity: "O(n)", color: "from-purple-500 to-pink-500" }, { title: "Frequency Count", description: "Count occurrences of elements in array", path: "/array-algorithms/frequency-count", timeComplexity: "O(n)", spaceComplexity: "O(n)", color: "from-red-500 to-orange-500" } ]; const ArrayAlgorithmsPage = () => { return (

Array Algorithms

Visualize array algorithms step by step

{algorithms.map((algorithm) => (

{algorithm.title}

{algorithm.description}

Time Complexity: {algorithm.timeComplexity}
Space Complexity: {algorithm.spaceComplexity}
Try it out
))}
); }; export default ArrayAlgorithmsPage
